explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a man wearing a pink T-shirt is pressing an orange balloon with both hands. Below the balloon is a cut watermelon.

[0-3] The man then presses the balloon onto half of the watermelon and starts to deflate it, wrapping the balloon around the watermelon. Then the scene switches to the inside of a refrigerator. A hand puts the watermelon wrapped in the balloon into the refrigerator. There are other foods in the refrigerator, including coconuts, sauces, and oil. There is also half a cantaloupe wrapped in a green balloon.

[3-12] The scene then switches to a dimly lit room where a man with curly hair is holding half an orange and a pink balloon. The man starts to inflate the balloon with his mouth, and the balloon gradually expands. He begins to imitate the previous man's actions, wrapping the balloon around the orange and pressing it with his hands, attempting to stuff the orange into the balloon. The orange is successfully stuffed into the balloon, and the man shows a surprised expression and then nods.
